title: Nvidia stock dips after company unveils latest AI chips
description: Nvidia shares dipped 3% Tuesday morning after the company unveiled its new generation of artificial intelligence chips called Blackwell.
keywords: Generative AI, Artificial intelligence, Technology, NVIDIA Corp, Breaking News: Technology, business news
snippet: Nvidia founder and CEO Jensen Huang displays products onstage during the annual Nvidia GTC Conference at the SAP Center in San Jose, California, on March 18, 20...
